;China Internet The 51st "Statistical Report on China's Internet Development Status" released by the Network Information Center shows that as of December 2022, people aged 60 and above accounted for 14.3% of the total number of Internet users, and the number of elderly Internet users reached 153 million. The emotional world of over 100 million elderly netizens lacks attention. (Visual China Picture)

;

;At three o'clock in the morning, Ruidi had insomnia again. He sent greetings to his sister on the other side of the network, just like the "good morning" and "good evening" repeated almost every day, waiting for his sister's greetings. comfort.

;

;Ruidi said that the encounter between him and his sister was arranged by fate. He reminded his sister to wear more clothes in the cold weather and take good care of her body. After exchanging heart-to-hearts with his sister day after day, his thoughts were "a ray of sunshine" and "I want to turn into the moonlight in front of the window to accompany her forever."

;

;The video sent by Ruidi shows that he is a man in his thirties or forties with a gentle voice and a back that looks like Jin Dong. Recently, his parents suddenly fell ill. In order to win the prize, he decided to participate in a singing competition. Just the night before the competition, he told his dilemma:

;

;"There are thresholds for participating in this competition. The popularity on the day of registration must be Only those who meet the requirements can be shortlisted... If you support your brother, can you help him increase his popularity data?... Sister, please give your brother some likes and praise for the author. 188 or 256 praises can help him."

;

;At the end of 2020, the "fake Jin Dong" phenomenon surfaced. A large number of fake accounts pretending to be actor Jin Dong used short videos and live broadcasts to make money from middle-aged and elderly fans. Two years have passed, and the aftermath of the "fake Jin Dong" incident continues. In September 2023, "Xiucai", an Internet celebrity with tens of millions of fans who specifically targets middle-aged and elderly people, was reported for tax evasion and defrauding fans, and his account was banned. In October 2023, the Shanghai Jing'an District Procuratorate prosecuted eight people who committed fraud under the false identity of Jin Dong.

;

;Nowadays, the position of "Fake Jin Dong" has moved from short videos to public accounts. These accounts calling themselves "Dongdi" and "Ruidi" first used video accounts to attract traffic and induce fans to pay attention to the subscription accounts, and then continued to make up stories in the public accounts to gain fans' sympathy and rewards.

;

;The new round of emotional harvesting is more private. After adding fans to WeChat on a large scale through public accounts, the interaction is transferred to private chats or circles of friends. The emotional hollowness of over 100 million elderly people has led them to fall into the trap. Is it not just a scholar or Jin Dong?

;

;;

;

;Grandma is in love

;

;Dong Xueru discovered the secret behind the subscription account by chance, and his 71-year-old grandma was already deeply involved in it.

;

;"My life is so busy every day, you know? I have nothing to do, sleep, watch videos, and that's it. Of course I want to see you, why do I want to see you? You miss me, and I do too. I miss you." My grandma said to a person on WeChat who had a note called "The Love of My Life."

;

;Dong Xueru looked through his grandma’s watch list and found a large number of public accounts and video accounts with similar names - "Brother Ruidong accompanies you", "Brother Dong accompanies sister", "Ruidi warmly accompanies me", "Ruirui Always with you" etc. The titles of public account articles are very long, for example, "Sister, I am really anxious. If I can't even seize this opportunity, I will be sad for a long time." The accompanying picture is usually a photo of a man.

;

;On the official account of "Rui Dongdi Lives Together", he claimed that he would participate in the top 20 of the singing competition, and Dong Xueru's grandmother encouraged him to work hard. Then the official account sent a payment QR code with the following sentence: "After my brother is done with work, he will accompany his sister to chat about daily life."

;

;Looking through these push notifications, you will find that this Rui Dongdi is really Very busy: one moment I have to help promote the competition, another moment I was successfully promoted, and now I am on TV. "I am in a hurry. If I don't see my sister at this time, my brother's future will be gone."

;

;This handsome and caring fake brother occupies an important position in some people's lives. From the comments, you can get a glimpse of the passionate hearts of fans. They are "Lotus", "Caiying", "Peace and happiness" or "Tomorrow will be better". They say, "Sister knows, I know you in my life, I am the happiest sister", "Thank you for caring about me".

;

;In their minds, the brother who spoke to them could be anyone. Dong Xueru discovered that her grandma regarded the other party as her crush in reality.

;

;My grandma is from Sichuan and lives in Beijing with few friends. For more than ten years, a man has regularly organized square dances for two to three hundred people near her residence. This teacher Tie often wears floral clothes with English letters printed on them, dyes her blond hair, and wears a little makeup. She becomes the idol of middle-aged and elderly people and calls them "sister". Later, my grandma moved and could no longer dance in the square. Instead, she took online dance classes and could only watch videos in the group.

;

;Grandma firmly believed that these messages were sent by Teacher Tie, because only Teacher Tie, who was eight years younger than her, would treat her like a sibling. "These (public accounts) different names are all the pseudonyms of Teacher Tie, and they are all his online names... All these articles are written for her." Dong Xueru told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;Grandma sends a lot of messages every day. "I feel like I have so much to say. As long as I sit down, I will hide in the room with my mobile phone and send voice messages." Once, my younger brother sent a message saying that he came to his sister's city and saw a figure that looked like his sister. He was very disappointed to find that it was not the same. Grandma comforted, "Fool, why are you disappointed? I'm thinking of you too."

;

;Dong Xueru and his family tried to persuade him many times but to no avail, and his grandmother felt bored. They took grandma to the local public security bureau to receive Internet security education, but grandma wouldn't listen and just asked the police if they could find people online.

;

;Dong Xueru’s mother and uncle had no choice but to ask Teacher Tie himself for clarification. Teacher Tie denied that it was him and made it clear that he had no time for a relationship and would not like her. The family played the recording to grandma, but she decided that the children were hindering her and pushing Teacher Tie too hard. "He is immature and childish."

;

;After speaking out online, Dong Xueru’s post received nearly 4,000 replies. Many netizens said that their family members have encountered similar situations.

;

;A girl sent a private message to Dong Xueru, saying that her grandmother was also obsessed with such public accounts and corporate WeChat. In addition to giving rewards, she would also buy high-priced goods sold by them. When the mother found out, she deleted the accounts in anger. Soon, the grandmother added them back, accusing her daughter of blocking her pursuit of happiness. The relationship between mother and daughter is still at a stalemate. The girl said to Dong Xueru, I really don’t know what to do.

;

;;

;

;A large number of brother accounts use subscription accounts, corporate and personal WeChat and Moments to conduct false emotional exchanges with the elderly, thereby inducing rewards. (Screenshot by Southern Weekend reporter Zhang Rui)

;

;The fake younger brother is back

;

;After Dong Xueru’s post attracted attention, the platform successively banned some younger brother accounts.

;

;Ma Kai got angry when talking about these Dongdi and Ruidi numbers. Ma Kai runs a number of emotional public accounts and has been implicated recently.

;

;Ma Kai’s public account is similar to an emotional radio station. The largest account has 34 million followers. It posts a six- to seven-minute emotional chicken soup every day, “What should you do if you feel tired, etc.” Emotional words."

;

;Ma Kai emphasized to Southern Weekend reporters that his account is different from the scam account. Accounts like Dongdi and Ruidi "won't tell you any emotional quotes or send you any songs, they will just kill pigs"; while my own "di" account relies on emotional copywriting to seek rewards. There will be no false identities, false stories, or emotional deception.

;

;He has been paying attention to these younger brother public accounts for a long time. They all speak in the same way and can be roughly divided into two categories: one is for younger brothers to participate in concerts and needs support from popularity; the other is for younger brothers who are sick and hospitalized and need support. Medical expenses.

;

;Diverting traffic from video accounts to public accounts is the beginning of harvesting. Operators leave links to public accounts in the comment area of ​​video accounts, place payment codes in articles on public accounts, or leave corporate WeChat or private accounts. WeChat.

;

;Most of the registered entities of these public accounts are enterprises. Southern Weekend reporters found that a large number of similar accounts were registered by several department stores in Haikou, with names such as "Xiu Cai Singing Department Store" and "Rui Rui's Department Store". According to industrial and commercial information, many department stores have different operators, but use the same mobile phone number when registering.

;

;Southern Weekend reporter contacted one of the operators Y. There are four Hainan department stores under Y's name, which are specially used to register younger brother's public accounts. WeChat stipulates that an individual business owner can register two public accounts.

;

;Y told Southern Weekend reporters that his team of three people has registered a total of 12 individual businesses. He has been working in this industry for nearly a year, and the largest public account has 70,000 to 80,000 followers, all of whom are Drain and accumulate traffic through video accounts. He refused to disclose his income, saying only that he "doesn't make much."

;

;On the e-commerce platform, for only 100 yuan, some merchants provide individual business license agency services, upload ID card information and mobile phone number, and perform remote real-name authentication. The store said that there is no limit to the number of registrations per person, and there is no need to pay money to continue after applying, and there is no need to worry about inspections by the industrial and commercial authorities.

;

;Using false individual business registrations to increase the number of WeChat public accounts is no longer a secret in the industry. These public accounts have become a powerful tool for batch release of information and batch operations. Y proved this. He is in Guangzhou, but his registered store is in Hainan. Ma Kai added that compared with the complicated materials that ordinary companies need to submit, individual industrial and commercial households only need to spend tens of yuan a year to prepare an annual report, and the above-mentioned merchants also provide agency services.

;

;A small program called "Praise" provides praise services for younger brother accounts. Unlike WeChat's direct rewards, third-party programs reward through jump links, which can avoid the risk of having your account frozen after being reported by users.

;

;In the comment area of ​​this mini program, there are still a lot of messages from sisters, "Hello, dear baby brother! Good afternoon! Sister gives you some love for the author. How is your brother? I miss you so much. You, my sister has had trouble at home these days, so she hasn’t sent many messages to my brother. I hope my brother will understand and forgive my sister. My sister really likes you and loves you. She loves you and will never leave you and will always be with you."

;

;;On November 14, "Praise" issued an announcement stating that the platform had no way of knowing whether users who received praise were committing fraud, and revealed that from October 9 to November 4, 2023, A user who was complained received a total of more than 250,000 yuan in praise. ;The amount of money defrauded can be staggering. In the early days, these accounts used WeChat to reward, and the number of rewards was publicly visible. Ma Kai observed that a Ruidongdi subscription account team from Fujian received at least 400 rewards a day at its peak, and it was estimated that the daily income could be as high as two or three dollars. Ten thousand yuan; another subscription account from Hebei has about 7,000 to 8,000 reads per day. The official account has not many fans. Before being blocked, it had accumulated more than 3,000 likes. According to his understanding, this type of account first started in Fujian and spread to Guangdong, Jiangxi, Chongqing and other places, and lasted for about a year.

;

;After these public accounts were banned by WeChat, they had to start looking for new methods. Their corporate WeChat account is still functioning. The original link to the official account was changed to a link to the "Tencent Content Creation Platform". The payment code can still be placed on the content interface. Moreover, if users have previously added their business WeChat accounts, they will still receive push messages every day.

;

;Recently, Ma Kai has been reporting on these corporate WeChat accounts, but with poor results. He dug up the historical records and said, “What you see is just the chatting and tipping on the surface. It is conceivable whether there are chats and transfers behind the scenes, right?” He believes that Enterprise WeChat is the real concentration of traffic. “Enterprises WeChat is originally a marketing tool and can add more people.”

;

;Y told Southern Weekend reporters that two-thirds of the accounts on the market are no longer there. He no longer has a similar account and plans to prepare live broadcasts to bring goods out of town.

;

;;

;

;On December 1, the public account "Dongyinxianban" published a new article, continuing the false younger brother persona and telling stories in the video to induce rewards. As of 10 o'clock that night, 38 people had tipped. The author of this article has posted similar content many times before, but has deleted it and canceled his account. Now it appears in a new public account. ;(Screenshot/picture from Southern Weekend reporter Zhang Rui);

;

;"She needs love, she is truly not alone"

;

; Xiao Lin runs an emotional public account for young people. Recently, she often receives some strange messages in the background.

;

;Due to changes in the push mechanism of WeChat public accounts, the platform will recommend content that may be of interest to non-followers. As a result, her public account was accidentally seen by some middle-aged and elderly people and became a favorite of some people. Emotional tree hole. Most of their messages are scattered and unclear, and they seem to express their feelings to someone:

;

;"Do you know? I have forgiven you a long time ago, and I am waiting for your sincerity to pick me up, you know?"

; p>;

;"You have been away from me for more than three years. It is normal to get married, start a family and start a business, but you are still in my heart."

;

;A woman from the Northeast has been sending voice messages almost every day since September. At first it was a long string of scoldings, but later her tone became gentle. She seems to have fallen in love with a man and regarded his official account as his. Sometimes, she speaks quickly and in a crying tone, always starting with "Dear baby" and repeating: Why don't you come back? Why don't you reply to my message?

;

;Xiao Lin did not dare to reply, for fear of breaking her confession.

;

;Dong Xueru only realized the delicate side of her heart from her grandma's love. My grandma lost her first husband more than 20 years ago and experienced two failed relationships. She followed her children to Beijing and barely attended school. She became literate through the Internet and likes to watch video accounts and public accounts.

;

;Dong Xueru grew up with his grandma. When his grandma first fell in love, she couldn’t type. She read a sentence and Dong Xueru typed: "Dear husband, I miss you so much. I love you. When will you come back to see me?" ." Sometimes, my grandma didn't know how to express it in words, so Dong Xueru helped her write some templates - "Dear, eat more and take care of your health" and "Dear, go to bed early", and grandma passed it on to the other party as needed.

;

;"No matter how old a man or a woman is, they will be lonely, especially if they are single. As a relative, the care you can give him is only part of it. She needs love to truly not be alone." Dong Xueru said that grandma was avoiding them more and more, and was still obsessed with the conversation with the teacher Tie in her mind.

;

;Wang Wenhan’s grandma is also addicted to short videos. In her description, her grandma was a simple and compassionate person who had been deceived many times in her eighty years of life and always believed those stories about poverty and misery. After my grandfather passed away five years ago, my grandma suddenly became free and her life revolved around her children. After moving to a big city, she lost contact with her friends and seldom socialized. Soon, she started to watch short videos.

;

;She often sees her grandma falling asleep while watching short videos, and then continues after waking up, muttering to herself in conjunction with the AI ​​dubbing in the short videos. The short video said, "Can I call you mom?" and grandma murmured, "Of course, kid."

;

;Wang Wenhan majored in gerontology when he was studying abroad. According to her observation, many elderly people abroad live in retirement communities and have their own social circles, but the elderly in China seem to need more emotion and sustenance. "They need to be provided with some emotional value, that is, they are needed, or they still have charm." Wang Wenhan said. For a while, her grandma told her that she always dreamed that she was leaving.

;

;In the "Research Report on Emotional Care for the Elderly and the Use Value of Short Videos", Peng Huamao, a professor at the Department of Psychology at Beijing Normal University, conducted a survey of 2,000 elderly people across the country. The research team found that the elderly who chase Internet celebrities on the Internet are still "too lonely and lack attention" in their offline lives. During the survey, Peng Huamao asked the elderly people interviewed whether they still need love. The vast majority of the answers are need, mostly the love of children, and of course the love of the opposite sex.

;

;Peng Huamao told Southern Weekend reporters that when the elderly and short videos are mentioned on the Internet, they are always about addiction, earthiness, etc., and most of them have negative impressions. An old man who travels thousands of miles to chase celebrities or give rewards in a live broadcast room will always be considered to be cheated. "The advanced psychological needs of the elderly are always ignored, such as the need for love, respect, and self-realization." One of the results of the survey is that the vast majority of elderly people have the ability to control and understand that this compensation is not actually true satisfaction, but a diversion of attention or the passing of time.

;

;Under Dong Xueru’s online post, a user left a message saying that her aunt encountered the same situation and fell into a brother-like public account and secretly rewarded her. After her wife discovered something was wrong with the money, she confiscated her mobile phone and called her relatives to persuade her. My aunt, who had been in charge of housework all her life, became almost crazy and cried loudly, not believing that this was a scam. The policeman called by her family was determined by her to be an actor.

;

;The final solution was that the family registered a fake WeChat account for the younger brother and chatted with the aunt in a way that "destroyed the personality". The younger brother ceased to be perfect and decent and became rude, shattering his aunt's fantasy. Finally, my aunt blocked this younger brother’s account.

;

;;(Dong Xueru, Ma Kai, Xiao Lin, Wang Wenhan are pseudonyms);

;"Let me tell you a story. There was an old man who took care of a granddaughter and a granddaughter at home, and ruined both children. The older one was only twelve years old and was three months pregnant, and was finally discovered by the teacher."

;

;On November 27, a video was circulated on the Douyin platform, attracting public attention. On November 29, Chongqing Hechuan Police issued a notice: This video is a rumor. Liu (female, 46 years old), a criminal, posted unverified rumors through Douyin in order to earn gold coins on the Douyin platform. Faced with doubts from netizens about the unverified rumors. To refute the rumors, it was clarified that as of the time the information was deleted, it had been commented and shared nearly 700 times by netizens, causing adverse effects. At present, the police have imposed administrative penalties on the woman involved.

;

;Judging from the police report, the woman involved should have committed an act that constituted "publicly insulting others or fabricating facts to slander others" in paragraph 2 of Article 42 of the "Public Security Administration Punishment Law of the People's Republic of China". She accepted the " shall be detained for not more than five days or fined not more than five hundred yuan." Judging from the behavior of the woman involved, her alleged illegal and criminal behavior may not be just "fabricating facts to slander others", and there is still room for continued discussion.

;

;Judging from the timeline of this case, the video uploaded by the woman involved can be said to be completely unrelated to pictures and texts. It only excerpted the video picture of the victim old man and his granddaughter, and then started to show the video to the wall. The fiction "played its best" and weaved an "incest tragedy". Its frivolous tone, bad nature, and clumsy techniques all made netizens look at it. When netizens questioned it, the woman involved did not delete it immediately, nor did she clarify or apologize. As a result, the video continued to spread. At the time of the incident, it had accumulated 700 comments and shares.

;

;It is not yet clear what channel or method the woman involved used to obtain the information of the old man and his granddaughter, but this first violated the personality rights of the victim’s grandparents and was a blatant violation. Their right to image and reputation. The particularity of this case is that the woman in question misappropriated the victim’s information, in addition to seeking the benefits of the Douyin platform gold coins. From the perspective of the result, it was a brutal trampling on the personal reputation of the victim’s grandparents and grandchildren. The severity of the crime was far beyond a simple "Making pornographic rumors" or "slandering".

;

;The Douyin platform can be regarded as a public place. If the woman in question makes such a specific and "below the lower limit" accusation in a public place, she has an obligation to ensure the authenticity of the accusation and at the same time defend her remarks. Responsible. Therefore, in addition to violating the Public Security Administration Punishment Law, the woman involved is also suspected of other illegal and criminal acts.

;

;According to Article 1 of the "Interpretations of Several Issues Concerning the Application of Laws in the Handling of Criminal Cases Using Information Networks to Commit Defamation" by the two top governments, "tampering with the original information content involving others on the information network into facts that damage the reputation of others" , disseminate on information networks, or organize or instigate people to disseminate on information networks" shall be deemed as "fabricating facts to slander others" as stipulated in Article 246, paragraph 1, of the "Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China".

;

;The behavior of the woman involved in this case has obviously met this requirement, and the video comments she posted on Douyin have been shared 700 times, which is in line with Article 2 of the judicial interpretations of the two Supreme Courts that "the number of reposts reaches More than 500 times" standard for "serious circumstances". According to Article 246 of the Criminal Law, the woman involved is guilty of defamation and the circumstances are serious, and she should be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years, criminal detention, public surveillance, or deprivation of political rights.

;

;In fact, compared with similar previous cases, the woman involved may deserve criminal punishment for her illegal and criminal behavior, rather than just administrative punishment.

;

;In the case of "a woman was rumored to be an old husband and a young wife" in 2021, the man involved, Wu Moumou, took a photo of the woman with her grandfather's grandparents and rumored to be an "old husband and a young wife", and also issued a sensational content of rumors. After the incident, the People's Procuratorate of the First District of Dongguan City prosecuted him for defamation. In September 2023, the court ruled that Wu Moumou fabricated facts to slander others on the information network. The circumstances were serious and seriously endangered social order. Based on the circumstances of the defendant's crime and his confession and punishment, the defendant Wu Moumou was sentenced to one year in prison for defamation.

;

;Wu Moumou’s behavior constituted the crime of defamation. The court adopted the relevant definitions in the judicial interpretations of the two Supreme Courts and determined that Wu Moumou had tampered with “original information content involving others on the Internet to damage the reputation of others.” Facts, disseminated on information networks”.

;

;To be fair, even if "old husband and young wife" is true, it does not violate any law in the marriage and family section of the "Civil Code of the People's Republic of China", and it does not even touch upon the so-called moral and ethical issues. This kind of news can at most arouse the curiosity and onlookers of netizens. In comparison, the rumor-mongering behavior of the woman involved in this case is even more outrageous.

;

;It is not difficult to imagine that if the accusation of the woman involved is true, then such a despicable "grandfather-grandson incest" has violated the criminal law and constitutes the crime of rape, and it meets the requirements of "under the age of fourteen, a severe punishment" "The standard is also in line with the standard in the "Opinions on Punishing the Crime of Sexual Assault on Minors According to the Law" that "persons who have a common family relationship with minors must be severely punished in accordance with the law." The "old man" involved may face severe punishments of more than ten years in prison, life imprisonment or death.

;

;Since the woman involved made such a serious public false accusation, she was suspected of false accusation and frame-up in addition to defamation. Article 243 of the Criminal Law also stipulates that fabricating facts to frame others with the intention of subjecting others to criminal prosecution constitutes the crime of false accusation and frame-up. If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years, criminal detention or surveillance; if serious consequences are caused, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years and not more than ten years.

;

;In this case, if the life of the victim’s grandfather and grandson is greatly affected and causes bad consequences, the woman involved should bear greater responsibility. Therefore, this case is not in compliance with the principle of proportionality. The woman involved is suspected of a criminal offense. The public authorities can continue to pursue her criminal responsibility, require her to apologize, eliminate the impact, and provide civil compensation. The three victims of the crime will also be given justice to their grandfather and grandson.

;My old friend, Brother Chunqiu, invited me back to my hometown for a wedding banquet on WeChat. His son-in-law is getting married and he will be back from abroad at the end of the month. wedding.

;

;Putting down the phone, I suddenly remembered how young and shy Brother Chunqiu was when he got married, and how busy Brother Chunqiu was when I was organizing the wedding banquet. At that time, he was still a newspaper reporter and made a cameo appearance in wedding photography. In the blink of an eye, our children also entered the palace of love one after another, and they "swore" like a couple.

;

;Thinking about the routine of the wedding dinner in my hometown, it’s actually a bit boring: first, it’s late and the endless waiting; second, it’s noisy and the endless routine. However, when I went back several times recently, I found that my hometown was also changing, becoming younger and more fashionable. When there is a happy event in the family, it is now fashionable not to be a part of it or give red envelopes. The "mutual exemption model" allows ordinary people to "joy" easily and "love" without worries, and also makes the hometown one of the first batch to be selected as an experimental area for national marriage custom reform.

;

;The wedding of Chunqiu Brother and Young Master was simple and cheerful. The subtleties are eye-catching and full of surprises.

;

;The highlight was the thank you session for the parents of the new couple. Dear Brother Chunqiu, hold your breath in Mandarin and write the first paragraph "thank you", the second paragraph "gratitude", and the third paragraph are two sentences of "remarks", specially given to your son and daughter-in-law: In a sea of ​​more than one billion people, you meet and get to know each other. Meet and fall in love. I hope you will cherish the fate of thousands of miles and thousands of years, and respect, understand and help each other. As parents of newlyweds, I would also like to remind you: First, always be kind and help those in need around you in a timely manner; second, always be grateful and never forget to care about those who help us... The true marriage between a Jiangsu boy and a Hunan girl is For the love of "rivers and lakes", I look forward to you riding the wind and waves and being proud of the "rivers and lakes"!

;

;These golden expressions are enough to be provocative. At the wedding scene, the parents of the newlyweds simultaneously hung up the red couplets of "Always Be Kind" and "Always Be Grateful". The eight big characters attracted the attention of the entire audience. , the banner of "Swordsman Jiangsu and Hunan" was unfolded, which pushed the atmosphere of the night to a new climax. In an instant, many people switched to "hilarious mode."

;

;The most ceremonial part was the "tribute moment", the high-profile appearance of the groom's 99-year-old grandmother. The old man came from out of town, more than 4 hours' drive away, to wish the newlyweds a long and happy life. The bride and groom made a special trip to hand over red envelopes and shouted in the old man’s ears: Grandma, may you be healthy for a long time! Happy for a long time! ! This was the fourth time the old lady attended her grandson's wedding, but it was the first time she received a blessing red envelope from the couple. She smiled like a child. According to reports, the red envelope is a lucky number: 999 yuan.

;

;What is interesting is the on-site blessing from Professor Zhu of Shanghai University Hospital: I am a cardiologist and have been dealing with the "heart" all my life. On this special day, I returned to my hometown and said a few words from my heart: First, in a small family, new people must be loyal to each other and care for each other. Entering the marriage hall today means the beginning of firewood, rice, oil, salt, pots and pans. In the future, small families will inevitably encounter small difficulties and setbacks. You must be patient! Second, in the workplace, you must be open-minded when it comes to professional matters, have perseverance in sticking to your post, and be enthusiastic about your colleagues! The third is to be kind and filial to your relatives, friends, parents, and elders in your hometown, and pay more attention to the details - your parents do not ask you to make much contribution, but there are overseas video calls every now and then, and they are sent to the family group every day. A smiling face is enough! As long as you have love, we can rest assured in our hometown!

;

;The wedding is the highlight moment for the newlyweds. The protagonists of the wedding are the groom and the bride, their growth background, love story, and future vision. ;

The next day, he went to Egypt again, traveled through the camel through the 150 -mile desert to the Suez Canal, and informed the British to quickly add reinforcements and transport food and other supplies.

;

Within a few days, his heroic deeds spread in the senior management of Egypt and London. As the Western Front war was unfavorable and the French army was changing, the victory of the British in the Middle East battlefield was particularly exciting.

;

In the hinterland of the enemy, secrets to meet and strive for potential conspirators, walking around in the middle of the people who want to be smoked, they may be sold and executed at any time. Then, the hero led the tribal warriors, who made a conspiracy and won a series of incredible victory with less victory.

;

; The British Egyptian commander Wengate proposed to the senior management of London: Lawrence awarded the highest military honor in Britain -Victoria Cross.很快，他被提拔为上校，并提名授予三等骑士爵位。

;

;这一回，桀骜不驯的劳伦斯却谦卑恭顺地接受了——官方的认可和荣誉也可以成为一种强有力的工具，去影响军事高层的决策，以实现他在沙漠里发下的誓言：突破法国人所设的“红线”，把战火一直烧到叙利亚，让英国人帮助阿拉伯人解放叙利亚。

;

;站在新任英国埃及远征军总司令埃德蒙·艾伦比面前，他描绘了一番激动人心的战况和未来前景。随即，艾伦比给帝国总参谋长威廉·罗伯逊拍去一份洋溢着乐观情绪的电报。最终，这位视西线为重中之重的总协调人答应给中东增兵5万，用于巴勒斯坦战场的攻势。

;

;这是阿拉伯大起义的一个关键转折点。撬动齿轮的人，正是劳伦斯。

;

;在高层要求下，这位“当红炸子鸡”写下了供海外作战军官参考的经验总结，是为《二十七条建议》。他最重要的心得是：抛弃英国人的习惯，让自己完全沉浸到当地环境，要熟悉“当地的家庭、氏族和部落、朋友和敌人、水井、山丘和道路”。

;

;2006年，美国对伊拉克发动军事行动，美军总司令戴维·彼得雷乌斯将军就命令高级军官们阅读《二十七条建议》，向劳伦斯学习如何赢得伊拉克本地的人心。

;

;

;被污损的英雄

;

;1917年10月起，一些接近劳伦斯的人发现他处于安静的沮丧状态。

;

;自从担任阿拉伯大起义的英方联络官，他一直过着高度紧张的生活，就像一个伟大的演员，马不停蹄地进行“惊险表演”。这在智力、体力、精神上都是巨大的消耗。

;

;更主要的原因，是越来越升级的杀戮。在《智慧七柱》里，他记录下第一次近距离处决一个人，然后他病倒了。起初，他带领阿拉伯人四处打游击战，尽量避免杀戮无辜。一次伏击行动中，他们抓住了一个撞见他们的牧童，劳伦斯把他绑在树上，以防他去给土军通风报信，战斗结束撤离前，再把他释放。随着战争越来越紧张、残酷，他已经顾不上很多了。

;

;等到亚喀巴战役的富维拉峡谷之战结束，他用极为诡异、凄美的文字描写了在月光下看到几百具被剥走衣服的土耳其士兵的尸体，看上去年轻、白皙、宁静，令人心生悲悯，“于是我把他们全都摆放整齐，一个一个地摆好。我自己也很疲惫，渴望成为这些宁静的人中的一员，而不是回到山谷高处那群没有片刻安宁、吵闹、苦痛的暴徒当中去。那些人还在为战利品而争。”

;

;面对越来越频繁的杀戮，他似乎越来越冷漠，越来越无动于衷。但在给牛津密友的信里，他倾吐说：“我希望噩梦结束，我能够醒来，重新活过来。杀人，杀土耳其人真是太可怕了”，“我知道自己已经干过这种事情几百次，如果可以的话，还要再干几百次”，“我在这场游戏里撑不了多久了。”

;

;上司克莱顿已经注意到这位最得力干将的精神状态，他承认对劳伦斯的状态非常担忧，“我们会尽快把他撤下来的，不要继续让他冒险，但时间还没有到，因为现在还需要他。”

;

;1917年11月，为配合埃及远征军对巴勒斯坦的攻势，劳伦斯带着一名护卫去勘查叙利亚境内铁路枢纽德拉附近的情况时，他被奥斯曼的一支部队逮捕了，然后被押到当地总督那里。劳伦斯谎称自己是高加索一个山地民族的平民，这个民族以皮肤白皙、眼珠浅色著称，且免于兵役。

;

;随后是他整部回忆录里最恐怖的场景，劳伦斯用了整整五页的篇幅描述自己所遭受的暴行细节——他先是被土耳其总督施以弥漫着血腥气息的暴力性侵；然后被四个士兵鞭打，接着是被刑讯军官反复踢打；他又被拖回总督的房间。后来他被扔在一个庭院里，一个亚美尼亚人过来为他清创、包扎。这群人随后扬长而去。

;

;天微亮时，劳伦斯清醒过来，跌跌撞撞地走出镇子。在一个骆驼商人的帮助下，他找到了同伴，然后讲述一个“通过贿赂和计谋逃脱敌人魔掌的欢乐故事”。

;

;人们发现：从德拉回来后，劳伦斯身上的一些东西变了，他更加孤傲冷漠。从那以后，这个过往胆大包天的人给自己组织了一支50人的精锐卫队，时刻陪伴在他身边。

;

;10个月后，等他率领阿拉伯战士再次回到这座铁路城镇，他带着复仇的火焰下令进行了一场血腥大屠杀，共有四千多人丧生，史称“塔法斯屠杀”。

;

;德拉事件给劳伦斯留下的精神创伤是永久性的——“一战“结束后，对被他视为忏悔神父般的存在的萧伯纳夫人，他倾吐了内心的被污损感和强烈的自我憎恶，“那件事”之后，他发誓从此“弃绝过体面的生活”。

;

;

;1962年电影《阿拉伯的劳伦斯》剧照;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;越缠越多的乱麻：贝尔福宣言，魏茨曼和劳伦斯

;

;1917年11月，英国埃及远征军顺利地突破奥斯曼军队防线，攻占巴勒斯坦地区。

;

;此时，劳伦斯已得知一个将使未来局面越发乱成一锅粥的消息：英国政府内阁在10月底初步通过了支持犹太复国主义者在巴勒斯坦建立“民族家园”的《贝尔福宣言》

;

;“锡安主义”，我国一般称之为“犹太复国主义”，是一种犹太民族主义思潮，号召散居世界各地的犹太人返回故国——巴勒斯坦，重建犹太国家，复兴犹太民族。

;

;到19世纪末，欧洲出现新一轮反犹太主义浪潮后，犹裔奥地利记者西奥多·赫茨尔提出了现代犹太复国主义的理论和纲领，并于1897年举行第一次锡安主义代表大会，创建世界锡安主义组织。

;

;1916年底，英国新首相大卫·劳合·乔治上任，他和外务大臣贝尔福都是锡安主义运动的同情者，并和该运动核心人物、著名化学家哈伊姆·魏茨曼有交往。除宗教同情之外，这也有现实政治的考量：“一战”陷入僵持后，交战双方都意识到犹太复国主义者的广泛影响，都希望得到他们的帮助；但德国碍于巴勒斯坦地区是盟友奥斯曼帝国的领地，无法许诺过多。

;

;1917年10月31日，英国政府内阁通过支持性决议，随之而生的《贝尔福宣言》正式宣布：支持锡安主义者在巴勒斯坦建立犹太人“民族之家”，条件是不伤害当地已有民族的权利，但是政治权利除外。当时巴勒斯坦仍然是奥斯曼帝国领土，犹太人只是当地的少数民族。

;

;《贝尔福宣言》是大英帝国的中东政策和以色列建国史上一个重要文件。它促成了巴勒斯坦托管地的建立，这后来成为以色列和巴勒斯坦领土，所以宣言也被视为是导致巴以冲突的一个原因。

;

;早在8个月前，劳伦斯在《阿拉伯公报》上发表了一篇对叙利亚现状的分析。他谈及了导致该地区四分五裂的原因，包括部落、民族、宗教之间种种矛盾，以及任何外来者企图把自己的意志强加于叙利亚，必将面临诸多挑战。劳伦斯还指出：巴勒斯坦南部对犹太复国主义运动者怀有莫大仇恨，包括穆斯林和基督徒，近来事态更是加剧了这种天生仇恨。

;

;事实上，这篇文章写于两年前，劳伦斯完全预见到了未来中东地区的无数动荡、冲突和不安。

;

;1918年2月，这篇文章引起了一位名叫威廉·耶鲁的美国驻中东代表的特别兴趣。这位年轻的前美国石油巨头雇员一心想让自己国家参与到中东事务中来，他于是去拜会劳伦斯，想得知更多相关情报。

;

;会面时，劳伦斯堪称毫无保留，甚至还透露了阿拉伯起义军下一步的军事行动目标。他还预言了《贝尔福宣言》的后果：“如果的确在巴勒斯坦建立了一个犹太国家，只能是通过武力来建立，并且要在充满敌意的人群当中通过武力维持下去。”

;

;有传记作者分析认为：劳伦斯是有意为之，他是想通过耶鲁去影响并引导加入协约国不久的美国政府，进而采纳他所认可的、对叙利亚和巴勒斯坦的政策。

;

;然而威尔逊总统在1919年的巴黎和会上无甚作为。直到第二次世界大战后，美国彻底取代英国成为世界头号霸主，同时接手其在中东的势力，成为现代以色列建国后最坚实的盟友。

;

;《贝尔福宣言》的公布，连同被曝光的《赛克斯-皮科协定》，在阿拉伯世界点燃了愤怒之火。在开罗，一向温顺的埃及穆斯林民众爆发了群体性抗议行动。叙利亚流亡者也越来越担心未来将有一个犹太国家会强加给巴勒斯坦地区。

;

;汉志国王侯赛因在阿拉伯半岛的最大对手伊本·沙特借此发起新一轮舆论猛攻。伊本·沙特来自控制内志地区的沙特家族，代表着伊斯兰教复古主义势力——瓦哈比教派。他一直有雄心一统阿拉伯半岛。他对外宣称：侯赛因国王是西方基督教的傀儡。但事实上，他本人也依赖于大英帝国殖民分支英属印度的支持。

;

;阿拉伯世界的强烈反弹，让英国大为不安。他们向侯赛因施压，要求他公开表态支持。克莱顿则要求劳伦斯去向费萨尔做劝说工作，尽管劳伦斯一直反对英国政府和犹太人之间的协定。

;

;1918年3月，在英国人的陪同下，由魏茨曼带队的“犹太复国主义委员会”对埃及、巴勒斯坦地区进行访问。在埃及，他向英国人、流亡的叙利亚人展开魅力攻势，一再表达犹太复国主义事业的善意。

;

;该年6月4日，魏茨曼又亲自到亚喀巴拜访费萨尔。会面气氛十分融洽，魏茨曼甚至带上了阿拉伯头巾；费萨尔则避免做出任何实质性承诺，推说一切决定权都在他父亲那里。劳伦斯找借口避开了，不管上司如何来电施压。他已判定：英国人强加的和谐，只会使得费萨尔和老侯赛因在阿拉伯世界遭到更大的反对声浪。

;

;10天后在埃及，他还是见到了魏茨曼。这位世故练达的犹太政治领袖很清楚：和阿拉伯起义领袖是否能达成谅解，关键就在于这位娃娃脸的小个子英国军官。高手过招，也生出了惺惺相惜——劳伦斯也很佩服魏茨曼的玲珑手腕，一面相当成功地消解了阿拉伯人的担忧，一面又用另一套言辞激发犹太人的斗志。

;

;两个聪明人达成一个共识——如果犹太人希望能在巴勒斯坦建立一个“民族家园”，就必须先让英国人打赢这场战争，这也就意味着他们应该先支持阿拉伯人的起义。魏茨曼还主动提出一项颇具诱惑力的“支持”：让国际犹太复国主义运动组织来资助阿拉伯独立事业，包括资金、武器。

;

;魏茨曼的魅力攻势取得了成效，他说服了大多数曾因《贝尔福宣言》而对巴勒斯坦未来感到担忧的英国官员，让他们相信：在巴勒斯坦，犹太社区可以和人口占多数的阿拉伯人在政治上和经济上共同生活、和谐相处。

;

;让上司们高兴的是，劳伦斯对犹太复国主义运动似乎不再那么抵触。但他也没有这么天真。在一份秘密报告中，他犀利地指出了这位犹太领袖的真实愿景——“50年之后犹太人将完全控制巴勒斯坦，而当前的目标是犹太人在英国幌子之下控制巴勒斯坦。”

;

;1930年代，希特勒在德国上台后，纳粹党徒对犹太人进行惨绝人寰的种族大屠杀，摧毁了欧洲多数犹太族群，犹太复国主义运动因此高涨，于1948年达到顶峰。当年5月14日，现代以色列正式建国，魏茨曼为首任总统。

;

;这一切比劳伦斯预见的还早了20年。

;

;徒劳的最后一搏

;

;1918年7月，劳伦斯开始策划耽搁许久的阿拉伯起义军北上叙利亚作战。随着事态发展，他越发清楚一个道理：只有在阿拉伯人自己解放的地区，他们的独立才能得到保障。

;

;在劳伦斯万般促成之下，安曼和约旦河以西聚集起一支由阿拉伯部族武装、阿拉伯北方军士兵、英法顾问和专门的炮兵、装甲车单位组成的混合部队，人数为几Thousands of people.一同到场的，还有重要的起义领袖：费萨尔、奥达，以及沙拉昂在内的主要部落酋长。

;

;大战前夕，传来一个令人心碎的噩耗——劳伦斯在卡尔基米什时期的伙伴、爱人达霍姆，那个有着灿烂笑容的叙利亚少年死于一场肆虐于叙利亚北部的伤寒疫情。

;

;在《智慧七柱》的扉页上，他写下一首献给达霍姆的情诗：;“我爱你，故我将这千军万马掬于手中/在繁星灿烂的天空里写下我的心愿，去为你赢来自由…/当我长驱直入，你的眼睛将因此熠熠生辉…/你的微笑令其（死神）妒从悲起，抛下我，将你掳走，囚入他死寂的幽冥。”;

;

;对劳伦斯而言，对达霍姆的爱，是他为阿拉伯人赢得自由和独立的最初动力。当梦想即将实现，爱人已逝，一种巨大的痛苦和虚空感把他压倒了。

;

;战争还在继续。 1918年9月，劳伦斯从英军司令部得到命令：让阿拉伯人彻底切断德拉以南的铁路线，但不可以北上冲向大马士革，以配合英军在约旦河西岸的北上行动。他们也转达对费萨尔的暗示：如果阿拉伯人在这个关键时候保持忠诚，将会得到很好的补偿，甚至将会允许他在大马士革建立一个政府。

;

;得到政府的口头保证后，劳伦斯在德拉一带领导、发动了对汉志铁路最凶猛的袭击。

;

;9月27日，在德拉附近那个给劳伦斯留下过严重创伤的名叫塔法斯的村镇，他和阿拉伯部队看到了一支撤退下来的同盟国军团留下的暴行：到处是残缺不全的尸体，姑娘和妇女们则裸露着带血污的身体，显然是被奸杀；在一堵矮墙上，倒着一具被刺刀穿透的裸身孕妇。

;

;劳伦斯随后下令：不接受任何俘虏。

;

;屠杀进行了一整夜，延续到第二天，共有四千多名被俘的同盟国士兵死于杀戮，是为“一战”中著名的“塔法斯屠杀”。次日清晨，劳伦斯进入德拉镇。

;

;一位英军将领率部稍晚赶到这里，他目睹的是肮脏、野蛮和残忍，阿拉伯战士如何折磨、打劫医护列车上痛苦呻吟着的土耳其病员，“任何一个普通的文明人都无法忍受这样的惨景”。当他向劳伦斯控诉时，劳伦斯平静温和地告诉他：这就是阿拉伯人的“战争观念”。

;

;经过德拉之战，奥斯曼军队已经全线崩溃。艾伦比将军给费萨尔发来热情洋溢的贺信说：“我向殿下表达我的祝愿，以及我对于您部队伟大成就的诚挚祝贺……多亏了我们的共同努力，现在土军正全线溃退。”他随后下令：把首先攻入大马士革的荣誉留给费萨尔的军队。

;

;1918年10月3日，在大马士革维多利亚饭店，英军总司令艾伦比和费萨尔会面了。劳伦斯充当翻译。

;

;艾伦比将军宣布：阿拉伯人作为参战国的地位，得到协约国承认；在叙利亚独立问题上，费萨尔没有选择，法国将成为保护叙利亚的“宗主国”；费萨尔作为侯赛因国王的代表，“将拥有叙利亚的管辖权”，但是“在法国的指导和财政支持下”，且他的管辖权“仅限于叙利亚内地”，不包括巴勒斯坦和黎巴嫩；法国将给费萨尔配一名联络官，他将与劳伦斯一同工作。

;

;劳伦斯和费萨尔惊呆了。费萨尔一开始激烈反对，但在艾伦比的施压下，最终只得屈从。在疲惫和失望中，劳伦斯转而向将军告假。将军最终同意了。次日，他离开了大马士革。

;

;谈判桌上的溃败

;

;1918年12月，巴黎和会召开之前，英国首相劳合·乔治与法国总理乔治·克里孟梭用了五分钟就中东愿景达成一致意见：英国人控制美索不达米亚和巴勒斯坦；法国人则有权处置叙利亚。除了《赛克斯-皮科协定》的基本结构被确定外，他们还大大超越了它。

;

;在巴黎和会上，身着阿拉伯长袍的劳伦斯担任费萨尔的顾问，为阿拉伯独立事业继续奔走，以翻译身份参与演讲和谈判，组织新闻发布会以及引导报纸舆论。这给同在会场的著名历史学家阿诺德·J·汤因比留下难以磨灭的印象。

;

;当时，恼怒万分的克里孟梭去英国代表团那里告了劳伦斯一状，并把这个年轻人叫来当面训斥。有“猛虎”绰号的法国总理劈头盖脸地问：“劳伦斯上校，你知道自从十字军东征以来，法国在叙利亚就有利益吗？”

;

;劳伦斯回答：“是的。我知道。但是叙利亚人打败了十字军，我们永远不会忘了这一点。”

;

;克里孟梭被驳得哑口无言。

;

;“这是一个饱受折磨的灵魂。我觉得劳伦斯在巴黎时已经意识到，尽管他在阿拉伯事业上取得了很多成功，但仍没有赢得胜利。”汤因比写道. “这让劳伦斯很苦恼，但痛苦并没有消磨掉他的幽默感，他有点伟大，还有点调皮。”

;

;英法的勾兑，摧毁了劳伦斯发下誓言为之奋斗的理想——阿拉伯人的民族独立。而对大英帝国的大人物们，“英雄劳伦斯”已经成为一个麻烦。在一份备忘录上，他们称其为“有害影响”，“很大程度上是我们与法国在叙利亚问题上麻烦的根源”。

;

;劳伦斯最终被剥夺了参加巴黎和会的资格，同时被禁止在会议上协助费萨尔。他输掉了。

;

;然而，他仍做出一个堪称了不起的努力。

;

;1918年12月巴黎和会前夕，在他促成下，作为阿拉伯世界代表的费萨尔和犹太复国主义运动领袖魏茨曼拟定一份联合声明，宣布双方的合作意愿.其中第四条为：“应采取一切必要措施，鼓励和促进犹太人向巴勒斯坦大规模移民”，然后是一个关键性条件句——该协定“仅在叙利亚区独立的情形下有效；如果不满足这个条件，就完全无效。”

;

;当时，费萨尔还友好地谈到阿拉伯人和犹太人之间的“种族亲缘关系和古老纽带”。

;

;在巴勒斯坦地区，水火不容的阿拉伯人和犹太复国主义者也曾携手起来想建立一个阿拉伯-犹太人的联合国家。然而，劳伦斯的努力真有现实可能性吗？ ——如果他在1918年成功了，一个独立的泛阿拉伯国家会因此诞生吗？如果历史如费萨尔和魏茨曼之间协议的那样发生了，阿以/巴以会彼此和谐地相处吗？

;

;作为和劳伦斯相隔一个世纪的后人，我很难乐观——纵观中东现代史，每回出现和解的曙光，都会有极端势力发起针对性的暗杀、破坏行动。在遇害者名单上，有侯赛因次子、约旦首任国王阿卜杜拉，埃及总统萨达特，推动“以土地换和平”的以色列总理拉宾……

;

;现代中东的诞生——划定疆域、拥立国王之人

;

;1919年秋的巴黎和会上，失去劳伦斯帮助后，费萨尔不得不接受法国人给出的条件。等回到大马士革，他发现自己被谴责为向欧洲帝国主义出卖祖国的叛徒。他转而利用民众的愤怒，于1920年撕毁了与法国人的协议，发动一场宫廷政变，自立为大叙利亚国王。同年4月，叙利亚被托管给法国。 7月，法国在麦塞隆战役中获胜，费萨尔流亡英国。

;

;至此，历史走向了另一条轨迹。

;

;控制了叙利亚地区的法国也没有好日子过——阿卜杜拉从外约旦对他们发动持续、凶狠的进攻。让英国人头痛的则更多：在巴勒斯坦地区，巴勒斯坦人和犹太定居者之间的冲突不断升级；在美索不达米亚，反英起义揭竿而起，到处都是流血和对抗。

;

;1920年，前海军大臣温斯顿·丘吉尔复出，后在劳合·乔治内阁转任殖民大臣。他向被打入冷宫的劳伦斯发出邀约，请他担任中东事务部负责人。

;

;心灰意冷的劳伦斯推说自己忙于写回忆录，对政治再无过问的兴趣。丘吉尔于是再三保证：在即将召开的开罗会议上，授予他几乎完全自由的权力，以帮助英国重新塑造中东棋盘上属于英国的那一部分。劳伦斯答应了。

;

;据他对一位传记作者透露：1921年3月的开罗会议只是走了一个过场，他和丘吉尔在会前“不仅确定了会议将审议哪些问题，还确定了将会达成何种决议”。

;

;根据决议，英国将它所控制的两块前奥斯曼帝国领土交给哈希姆家族。双方同意：费萨尔王子成为美索不达米亚新国家国王，即伊拉克王国；他的兄长阿卜杜拉王子则统治约旦河以东、由部分巴勒斯坦组成的新国家，即今天的约旦王国.

;

;这基于劳伦斯一直为之奋斗的两个想法：首先，阿拉伯人必须获得对自己土地的控制权。其次，被赋予这种权力的阿拉伯人，是起义领袖哈希姆家族成员：侯赛因国王和他的儿子们。

;

;劳伦斯的努力，为中东地区带来一段时间和平，也部分兑现了他对阿拉伯人在大起义时的承诺。一般认为：在1921年的开罗会议上，劳伦斯的作用大过了丘吉尔——最终，他真的成为了在中东地区划定疆域、拥立君王的那个人。

;

;在安纳托利亚地区，前奥斯曼将领穆斯塔法·凯末尔带领土耳其民族主义者，把所有企图瓜分者打得落花流水。 1923年，他和协约国签订条约，确定了现代土耳其的疆域。

;

;在南方，汉志国王侯赛因拒绝接受中东的现实政治，即使劳伦斯也无力说服。他的顽固和反复无常，最终让英国政府感到厌烦。老对头伊本·沙特利用了这一矛盾，于1924年带领瓦哈比战士逼近麦加。在众叛亲离之下，侯赛因避难塞浦路斯，后到新约旦首都安曼和次子阿卜杜拉团聚。 1931年6月，侯赛因去世，安葬于耶路撒冷。

;

;赢家伊本·沙特吞并汉志后，建立沙特阿拉伯王国。 1927年，英国人宣布承认其独立。

;

;经过短暂的和平后，新的动荡又开始了。 1946年，法国人最终被迫放弃大叙利亚地区，但又从中分割出一个新国家——黎巴嫩。 1958年，伊拉克民族主义者发动军事政变，推翻了亲英政权，费萨尔独子费萨尔二世被处决。

;

;1960年代，西方殖民主义时代落下了帷幕。因为拥有占全世界六成的石油资源，中东如同被咒诅一般，继续成为地缘政治中最不安宁的角落。

;

;“当死神追上了我”

;

;1921年，当劳伦斯在为丘吉尔奔走效力时，他给一位朋友写信说：“阿拉伯人就像是我翻过的一页，续集是我很讨厌的东西”。一战后，他一直患有严重的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）,不断受到噩梦惊扰，多次陷于严重的抑郁，甚至萌生过自杀的念头。

;

;1920年起，劳伦斯根据笔记和回忆，重写自传，完成战争回忆录《智慧七柱》。他用手摇印刷机印了8本，分赠好友。后应公众的强烈要求，他做出妥协，在1926年出版了该书的删节版，同时又发行了大众版《沙漠中的起义》，后者取得了市场成功。劳伦斯把版税全部捐给慈善组织，并拒绝有生之年再版《智慧七柱》。

;

;他再也无法回归到一个学者的往日生活。 1922年，结束了在英政府殖民部的任职后，他化名约翰·休姆·罗斯，以普通列兵的身份加入英国皇家空军，但很快就被新闻界所发现。

;

;他又改名为托马斯·爱德华·肖，继续在军队服役，逃避对他穷追不舍的报界和公众。在生命的最后十多年，他过着离群索居的生活，用各种借口推掉朋友们的邀请，即使是最亲近的朋友。

;

;成为伊拉克国王的费萨尔跟劳伦斯后来又见过两次，一次是1925年，面对曾经并肩作战的生死之交，劳伦斯无所适从，二人一度相顾无言。

;

;1933年费萨尔访英时再次提出要见劳伦斯，劳伦斯态度消极，后来费萨尔不得不借助军方的命令，才得以见到“列兵肖”。

;

;1935年5月13日，劳伦斯骑着摩托车，去博文顿军营发一份电报。回程途中，遭遇一起交通事故。在部队医院昏迷六天后，于5月19日清晨去世，时年46岁。

;

;“二战”阴云逼近，正陷于“困惑岁月”的丘吉尔前来悼念，写下一段政治家才有真正共鸣的悼词：“在我眼中，他是我们时代最伟大的人物之一……我担心，不管我们多么需要，像他这样的人都永远不会再有了。”

;

;（参考书目及资料：《智慧七柱》T·E·劳伦斯著；《阿拉伯的劳伦斯：战争、谎言、帝国愚行和现代中东的形成》斯科特·安德森著；《交游录》阿诺德·J·汤因比著；Clio数字化历史博物馆网站。）

; Sat, 02 Dec 2023 10:25:04 +0800 无尽的纷争：雷颐的2023年读书小记http://www.infzm.com/contents/261708

;

;Making reading and writing a career, of course I will not finish reading in 2023 Few books. If we could sum up this year's reading and thinking with one title, the most appropriate one would be the title of one of the books: "Endless Conflict." Real-life conflicts and wars have triggered "reading circles" from the international to the domestic, or Talk about the huge disputes in the intellectual and ideological circles. I hope this kind of dispute will bring about more profound discussions and thoughts.

;

;;

;

;Zhu Zheng: "Shi Ling New Collection", Huacheng Publishing House, June 2023.

;

;Mr. Zhu Zheng is a great editor, literary and historical figure who "emerged" after the reform and opening up. He was mainly an editor at first, and later a writer. Editing and writing, writing and editing, complement each other, making him a master of literature and history. His essays often have the sharpness of essays, but also contain many historical facts that essays lack. "Shiling New Collection" released by Huacheng Publishing House collects his main essays from 1987 to 2021. It is only a little over 200,000 words, but each chapter is based on solid historical materials. These dozens of essays form part of contemporary cultural history.

;

;;

;

;[US] Richard Pipes: "Russia under the Old Regime", Democratic Construction Press, May 2023.

;

;Russia is a big country across Europe and Asia. The "Soviet Union" with Russia as the main body was once one of the two superpowers in the world and had an impact on the world. Tremendous influence. Such a huge country was formed not long ago. It is not a European country, but it is not an Asian country either. Its unique culture and vast territory have formed its own governance model, political and economic systems. "Russia Under the Old Regime" combs through the evolution of Russia from the 9th century to the 1880s, providing a clear description and in-depth analysis of the complex history. Only by understanding its past can we have a deeper understanding of its present and future.

;

;;

;

;Lin Huihuang: "Portrait of Huacun: Peasant Life in Transformation China", Oriental Publishing House, August 2023.

;

;"Beautiful Countryside" is a major rural construction project promoted by the country and an important step in targeted poverty alleviation. "Flower Village" was originally an ordinary village, but after it was selected as a demonstration site for beautiful rural construction, the social ecology underwent major changes and a large amount of project funds were instantly received. "Portrait of Hanacun: Peasant Life in Transformation China" takes real rural areas as examples and discusses some common problems encountered in the development of Chinese rural areas in case studies. By telling the stories of different farmers, the author explores different themes, including farming, working, mechanical farming, crop planting adventures, farmhouse entertainment, agricultural industrialization, rural governance, rural revitalization, etc. The core question is that most of these project funds are used for major issues that county and township governments are interested in, rather than major issues that farmers are really interested in. Why is this? What is the mechanism that creates this situation? The author's questions are thought-provoking.

;

;;

;

;[US] Walter Isaacson: "The Biography of Kissinger", CITIC Publishing House, September 2023.

;

;In 2018, CITIC Publishing House published "Kissinger: The Idealist" by American historian Ferguson, which provided an in-depth analysis of Kissinger's early thoughts. Research, I have written book reviews, and I have gained some understanding of Chi's early thoughts, which I didn't know much about before. This year, CITIC Press released "Kissinger's Biography" by the famous American biographer Isaacson. What interests me is still Kissinger's early experience.

;

;Kissinger is a Jewish refugee who fled Germany to the United States with his family in 1938 when he was 11 years old. Previously, he was discriminated against and persecuted in the German city of Fürth, which he found incomprehensible at a young age. The city of Fürth is not big. Except for the Jewish children, almost all the people in the city are members of the "Hitler Youth". He and his brother were standing on the street and saw them wearing uniforms, singing in lines and marching in neat steps. They didn't understand why they couldn't right to participate. On the contrary, he and his brother were ridiculed and ridiculed everywhere, and soon they were no longer allowed to go to the swimming pool, dance, or teahouse... More and more places had "Jews prohibited" signs.

;

;After immigrating to the United States, his parents worked for others and their income was not high. After one year of high school, Kissinger had to switch to "night school". Work during the day and study at night. His job was to work in a shaving brush factory run by a relative, wearing thick rubber gloves and squeezing the solution and water out of the brushes. The weekly salary was 11 US dollars, and he was later upgraded to a delivery person, responsible for delivering goods, and the weekly salary increased to 30 US dollars. Colleagues recalled that he was often absent-minded at work, reading or doing night school homework whenever he had the chance. His early experiences were quite "inspirational".

;

;The painful childhood experience had an unforgettable impact on him. “For Kissinger, the Holocaust destroyed the link between God’s will and historical progress—a core belief of Judaism and its most important contribution to Western philosophy. For believing Jews, history The meaning of should be understood from its connection with God’s will and heavenly principles. But after witnessing the evil deeds of the Nazis, Kissinger abandoned his Jewish faith. While studying at Harvard, the young student began to focus on academic aspects Explore other ways of finding historical meaning." His inner academic "module" was always European rather than American. He was fond of Kant, Hegel, Metternich, and Dostoevsky, but never I have expressed my appreciation for the archetypal figures who represent American creativity, such as Mark Twain, Jefferson, and Franklin. His childhood experience formed his basic idea: the pursuit of order.

;

;;

;

;[US] Perry Miller: "Endless Conflict: American Intellectual Life from the Revolution to the Civil War" , Oriental Publishing House, July 2023.

;

;In recent years, Oriental Publishing House has planned and published the "American Civilization Classics Translation Series". Qian Mansu, the editor-in-chief of the series and a researcher at the Institute of Foreign Languages, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, is a graduate of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences after the reform and opening up. The first batch of students studying in the United States studied the history of American civilization at Harvard University. This series of books is well-selected, and "Endless Conflict: American Intellectual Life from the Revolution to the Civil War" is one of them. Published in 1965, this book won the 1966 Pulitzer Prize for History. It is Miller's next grand work on the history of American thought after "American Spiritual Life: The Seventeenth Century" and "American Spiritual Life: From Colonies to Provinces" . This book was published nearly a year ago and has become a classic after the test of time. In this book, Miller attempts to grasp the religious roots of American culture and explain why the spirit of religion and the spirit of freedom, which are often opposed to each other elsewhere, are almost integrated in the United States. The contradiction and conflict between religion and secularity is a global problem. In the era of globalization, can the history of more than a hundred years ago be enlightening?

;

;On November 11, 2023, the Philippine police discovered multiple tools in succession near a construction site in Laihu Bay. The remains are suspected by the police to be the six Chinese citizens who were kidnapped on October 30: including Mr. Zeng and his wife who are presidents of local Chinese charity organizations in the Philippines, brother Zeng and his wife, and brother Zeng’s teenage son. son, and one person remains unidentified. On November 28, the Philippine police confirmed the identities of four corpses, including Mr. Zeng’s two brothers.

;

;In recent years, vicious cases involving overseas Chinese have occurred in some overseas countries: In May 2023, a Chinese couple died naked in a Bali hotel; in 2023, a Chinese student was murdered in Thailand on "3·31"... …In addition to these brutal cases, the criminal system of the warlords in northern Myanmar is basically tailor-made for the Chinese people. The number of Chinese people they have killed and the seriousness of their crimes are really too numerous to describe. Recently, the "Ming Family" in northern Myanmar, which specializes in telecommunications fraud, has reached the end of its rope and is about to be destroyed.

;

;With the country's economic development, foreign economic, trade and cultural exchanges have increased, and Chinese people at home and abroad have more and more interactions with the world. Opportunities are always accompanied by challenges, and contradictions, conflicts, and dangers are everywhere. How to ensure one's personal and property safety, as well as legal rights, has become increasingly important. Examples of self-security and collective security for overseas Chinese can be found in the Korean community living in North America and the Jewish community scattered around the world.

;

;South Korea has a small population, and even fewer people live in the world. However, a small number of Korean immigrants (mainly immigrants from South Korea) became a bright spot in the "Los Angeles Riots" in 1992: After the U.S. police temporarily gave up protecting communities of color, a small number of Korean immigrants united and armed themselves for self-defense , took up arms to defend the community, resisting the onslaught of thugs, and held on until the National Guard entered the city to quell the violence.

;

;For decades, Koreans have deeply felt the importance of external unity. Their overseas immigrants have strengthened internal unity, taking advantage of North American citizens' gun-carrying laws to arm themselves for self-defense and strengthen their martial spirit. Therefore, even though the 1.65 million Korean immigrants only account for 0.5% of the U.S. population, North American residents know that Koreans are not easy to mess with and they dare to use guns in critical moments. Therefore, the thugs of the "Los Angeles Riots" were unable to capture the strongholds held by Korean armed forces, so they looted Chinese stores because the Chinese generally lacked the ability to defend themselves at the time.

;

;Before World War II, the Jewish community was known for being disunited, disorganized, shrewd and philanthropic, and gentle and cowardly. It is said that there are 12 branches of Judaism since ancient times. There are so many factions and small groups below. The Jews who run banks are greedy for money and are unwilling to help others. Therefore, few people are willing to help them.

;

;In order to better integrate into European society, the Jews not only accepted many Western living habits, but also tried to avoid confrontation when they had conflicts with the indigenous peoples. Therefore, various European ethnic groups have long scorned the military value of the Jews.

;

;During World War II, the Holocaust in Nazi Germany nearly annihilated European Jewry, which changed the spirit, character, and psychology of some Jews. After the war, some Jews reached several consensuses:

;

;

;As of November 28, 2023, NIO has built 2,184 power swap stations around the world. Visual China/Photo

;

;Following Changan Automobile (000625.SZ), NIO (09866.HK, NYSE:NIO) has made another success with its battery swap.

;

;On November 29, 2023, Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Geely Holding) and NIO officially signed a strategic cooperation agreement on battery swapping in Hangzhou. The two parties will work on battery swapping standards and battery swapping technology. , carry out comprehensive cooperation in various fields such as battery swap service network construction and operation, battery swap model R&D and customization, battery asset management and operation.

;

;According to the agreement, in the future, the two parties will create two major battery swap standard systems for "private cars" and "commercial vehicles" through the "co-investment, co-construction, sharing, and co-operation" model to promote vehicle-end , station end, battery end, and operation end are connected and coordinated to expand the scale of the battery swap network to meet users with different needs.

;

;On November 20, NIO founder Li Bin revealed in an internal speech to all employees that in addition to Changan Automobile, there are 4-5 potential partners currently being negotiated. In other words, more car companies may join NIO's "circle of friends" for battery swapping.

;

;Li Yanwei, the expert committee of the China Automobile Dealers Association, told Southern Weekend reporters that the expansion of the "circle of friends" for battery swapping has a strategic significance higher than the practical level, and it will have a limited effect on improving their respective revenue in the short term.

;

;In his view, the initial cooperation between the parties is exploratory and may start with operating vehicles such as online ride-hailing. "If the results are good, it may be upgraded to more important models or high-value models." ".

;

;There are only two roads in front of you

;

;Recently, a piece of news "NIO lost 76.4 billion in five and a half years" appeared on Weibo's hot search.

;

;From 2018 to 2022, NIO’s net profits attributable to the parent company were -23.328 billion yuan, -11.413 billion yuan, -5.611 billion yuan, -10.572 billion yuan and -14.559 billion yuan respectively. In the first half of 2023, NIO's net profit attributable to its parent company continued to suffer a loss of 10.926 billion yuan, with a cumulative loss of 76.4 billion yuan in 5.5 years.

;

;Although at the recent Guangzhou Automobile Industry Development Conference, NIO co-founder and president Qin Lihong emphasized that "NIO will never go bankrupt, and it is impossible for it to go bankrupt." But it is undeniable that Weilai has invested too much in “peripheral products” and its sales have declined.

;

;Previously, Li Bin’s internal speech to all employees was also on the hot search. He said that the road to battery replacement is very difficult, but it is difficult and the right thing to do. "Everyone thinks of battery replacement as Amazon doing cloud services in 2003, as well as Alibaba, Tencent, Microsoft, etc. They have suffered losses for many years. Only then did we finally achieve success.”

;

;NIO and NIO’s battery swap are always accompanied by controversy. The construction of a service system with power exchange as the core is regarded as the main reason for NIO's losses.

;

;According to the plan, NIO will deploy a total of 2,300 power swap stations in 2023. As of November 28, NIO has built 2,184 power stations around the world.

;

;Although the cost of each generation of NIO's three generations of power swap stations is slightly different, if based on a rough calculation of the 3 million yuan cost of each power swap station stated by Qin Lihong at the 2023 Shanghai Auto Show, NIO's power swap performance will be The cumulative investment has exceeded 6.5 billion yuan. This does not include additional expenses such as venue rental, personnel operations and electricity expenses. Based on NIO’s goal of adding 1,000 battery swap stations in 2023, the cost of building the stations alone will be as high as 3 billion yuan.

;

;Shen Fei, NIO’s vice president in charge of NIO Power, revealed at a press conference in March that the battery swap station had to serve 50-60 orders per day to achieve breakeven. At that time, NIO’s battery swap station averaged 35 orders per day. -36 orders. The implication is that Weilai is still in the loss-making stage when it comes to battery replacement.

;

;Li Yanwei believes that NIO positions itself as a luxury brand and provides services such as battery replacement and user rights to make up for the lack of product and brand power. It has indeed played a very good role in brand building in the early stage. However, as investment increased, its sales volume did not increase significantly, but instead became a huge burden. "Keeping it has limited use, just throw it away. It's a pity."

;

;There are only two ways in front of Weilai, either to sell more cars and dilute the power exchange network construction from within. or introduce more car companies to participate in NIO’s power swap network to create a scale effect and alleviate financial difficulties.

;

;In fact, Weilai has already had clues about opening up the battery swap business. At the China Electric Vehicles 100 People Forum held in April 2023, Li Bin said that "the battery swap service has reached the stage where it can be exported to the outside world." He hoped that other companies can share and build charging and swap infrastructure with NIO, and revealed that there are already Car companies are discussing this matter with NIO.

;

;Fu Yuwu, honorary chairman of the Society of Automotive Engineers of China, told Southern Weekend reporters that as the current battery swap model has not yet found a profit model, there are only more battery swap stations and a more convenient energy replenishment experience. Only then can more users be willing to buy battery-exchange models, thus forming a positive cycle. NIO's cooperation with Geely, Changan and other automobile manufacturers will help promote the battery swap model on a larger scale, improve the overall operating efficiency of the battery swap model, and may solve the commercialization problem of battery swap.

;

;Or start from online car-hailing services

;

;The battery swap model laid out by NIO does have many advantages. For example, it only takes less than 5 minutes for car owners to replace the battery at the battery swap station. However, the disadvantage is that the battery swap model still faces problems such as high website construction costs, uncertain commercialization models, and inconsistent industry standards.

;

;At present, there are several companies on the market that are trying to lay out the power swap model, but the construction of power swap stations is independent of each other. Since 2020, relevant national departments have continued to promote the formulation of standards for battery swap stations and battery packs.

;

;At the 2023 World Power Battery Conference, Xin Guobin, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, revealed an important signal. Currently, a battery replacement technology standard system is being studied and compiled to promote battery replacement battery size, battery replacement interface, Standards such as communication protocols are unified. At the same time, relevant departments have also entered into the inspection process for the national battery replacement station standards.

;

;Fu Yuwu believes that each car company has different models and batteries. In the context of cooperation, battery swapping may require a transition period to improve the versatility of the battery swapping network. "However, it can force companies to make better efforts in standardization, which is of key significance to the structural adjustment of the battery swap model."

;

;However, some people question that unified battery swap operation management may affect Wei Come to the battery swapping experience of existing users.

;

;Unlike NIO’s battery swap model, most car companies are betting on high-voltage fast charging.

;

;The 800V high-voltage fast charging platform is currently regarded as the most likely technology path. In 2019, Porsche launched the Taycan, the world's first 800V high-voltage platform model. Automobile manufacturers such as BYD, Xpeng, Great Wall, Geely Jikrypton, etc. have all begun relevant layouts.

;

;“In the long term, 800V will be an opportunity to reshape the battery industry,” Li Bin said at the 2023 Shanghai Auto Show. “But no company has yet been able to reduce the cost of 800V to close to that of the current 400V. or a slightly higher level.”

;

;Li Yanwei also believes that high-voltage charging costs are high and is currently mainly used in relatively high-end models. It is unlikely that the technology will be transferred to low-end models in the short term. In addition, the layout of high-voltage charging piles is still imperfect, and an absolute advantage over the battery swap model has not yet been established in the short term.

;

;It is worth noting that Liu Jinliang, CEO of Yiyi Internet Technology Co., Ltd., signed the power exchange cooperation with NIO on behalf of Geely Yifang this time. He has led Geely's travel business in recent years, and has been responsible for Caocao Private Car, Yao Travel and other sectors.

;

;Li Yanwei said that online car-hailing may be the first area of ​​cooperation between the two parties. Due to cost control, operating vehicles such as taxis and online ride-hailing vehicles mostly use lithium iron phosphate batteries. The batteries are used frequently, so the demand for battery replacement will be higher.

; Fri, 01 Dec 2023 20:25:05 +0800 数据安全榜：谁在尽心倾力守护您的金融隐私？http://www.infzm.com/contents/261700
